short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate tool for bulk messaging,reminders and contact export

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feedbot is a sophisticated communication platform that enhances customer engagement via WhatsApp. It allows unlimited message sending, scheduled deliveries, and customization without requiring prior contact addition. Designed for marketing teams, e-commerce stores, and customer service, Feedbot offers simple pricing, robust security, and easy integration with CRM systems. It supports extensive automation through APIs, ensuring streamlined and efficient client interactions.
